Describe Variable

Describe Variable

describe_variable(x)

Arguments

x

a vector representing a single variable

Value

a data.frame summary of the variable

Examples


var1 <- sample(1:5, 50, replace = TRUE)
describe_variable(var1)
#>                 1    2    3    4    5
#> 1  Frequency    5   11    9   15   10
#> 2 Proportion 0.10 0.22 0.18 0.30 0.20

var2 <- runif(50)
describe_variable(var2)
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#> 1 0.01   0.53 0.49 0.97 0.32         0       50
var3 <- rep(letters[1:5], each = 5)
describe_variable(var3)
#>                 a    b    c    d    e
#> 1  Frequency    5    5    5    5    5
#> 2 Proportion 0.20 0.20 0.20 0.20 0.20

var4 <- rep(c(TRUE, FALSE), c(70, 30))
describe_variable(var4)
#>              FALSE TRUE
#> 1  Frequency    30   70
#> 2 Proportion  0.30 0.70

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
